# Quick Examples

Minimal examples demonstrating the API for each solver (10-20 lines each). Good for copy-pasting into your own code or just seeing how a solver works without the ceremony.

## Running Examples

```bash
python lp_example.py
python dijkstra_example.py
```

## Examples

| File | Solver | Problem |
|------|--------|---------|
| lp_example.py | solve_lp | Linear programming |
| milp_example.py | solve_milp | Mixed-integer LP |
| sat_example.py | solve_sat | Boolean satisfiability |
| cp_example.py | Model | 4-Queens with CP |
| anneal_example.py | anneal | Rastrigin function |
| tabu_example.py | tabu_search | Small TSP |
| genetic_example.py | evolve | OneMax problem |
| differential_evolution_example.py | differential_evolution | Rosenbrock |
| particle_swarm_example.py | particle_swarm | Sphere function |
| nelder_mead_example.py | nelder_mead | Booth function |
| gradient_descent_example.py | gradient_descent | Quadratic |
| momentum_example.py | momentum | Rosenbrock |
| adam_example.py | adam | Rosenbrock |
| bfgs_example.py | bfgs | Rosenbrock |
| powell_example.py | powell | Rosenbrock |
| bayesian_example.py | bayesian_opt | Black-box |
| dijkstra_example.py | dijkstra | Shortest path |
| bfs_example.py | bfs | Unweighted path |
| astar_example.py | a_star | Grid pathfinding |
| bellman_ford_example.py | bellman_ford | Negative weights |
| floyd_warshall_example.py | floyd_warshall | All-pairs |
| max_flow_example.py | max_flow | Network flow |
| kruskal_example.py | kruskal | MST |
| prim_example.py | prim | MST |
| hungarian_example.py | hungarian | Assignment |
| dlx_example.py | exact_cover | Exact cover |
| network_simplex_example.py | network_simplex | Min-cost flow |
